syntax:
abstract int
fact duplicable int
data bool = True | False

data t a = A | B { b: a }

val v14 =
  if explain True then begin
    let x = 2 in
    if True then A else B { b = x }
  end else begin
    let y = 2 in
    if True then A else B { b = y }
  end
